DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmst_vehiclesituation x left join tms.xtmsm_vehicle x0 on x.vehicleid=x0.vehicleid left join tms.xtmst_vehiclerealtime x1 on x.vehiclerealtimeid=x1.vehiclerealtimeid left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x2 on x.operatetype=x2.typecode left join tms.xtmst_freight x3 on x.freightid=x3.freightid left join tms.xtmsm_xsite x4 on x.xsiteid=x4.xsiteid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x5 on x.cityid=x5.cityid
DbDetails.Queryformat: select %{data} from (select x.xtmst_vehiclesituation_id from %{dbtable} where x1.carrierid='%{orgguid}' %{where} GROUP BY x.xtmst_vehiclesituation_id ORDER BY x.xtmst_vehiclesituation_id) t
